textAfterTable: Size Waist (IN) Hips (IN) Rise (IN) Inseam (IN) Cuff (IN) UK 8 26 31 8 32 11 UK 10 28 32 8 32 12 UK 12 30 34 8.5 32 13 UK 14 32 35 9 32 14 UK 16 34 36 9.5 32 14 UK 18 36 38 9.5 32 15 How To Find The Correct Jeans SizeWe know that purchasing clothing on the internet can lead to size mismatches, but not at Blue Banana. We aim to deliver you the perfect size every time! In order to measure your Bleeding Heart jeans size, you need to measure in five key areas and then compare them to the size guide above: 1. Waist  Measure around your natural waistline. 2. Hips  Measure around the widest part. 3. Rise  Measure from the top of your inside leg to waist. 4. Inseam  Measure from top of your inside leg to ankle bone. 5. Cuff  Measure the circumference around your ankle.
